tool_description: Performs final quality assessment of digitized genealogy documents, validating completeness and accuracy of the entire processing pipeline.

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the processed document

error_messages: Missing document ID: Unique document identifier is required for QA.
Original image not found: Cannot access source image for comparison.
Empty processed text: Final text content cannot be empty.
Invalid metadata JSON: Metadata must be properly formatted JSON.
Missing index data: Index entries are required for completeness check.
QA processing failed: Unable to complete quality assessment.
usage: Provide all pipeline outputs including document_id, original_image_path, processed_text, metadata_json, and index_entries for comprehensive quality validation before archiving.

qa_status.description: Overall quality status: passed, warning, or failed
